body: Hi djordje, thanks for the updates. Now the analysis component works fine.   [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/sncWs2jh2LKwACKpVQINTU8Is5YuJEFzY7JS79aaqzYUFXiUhA7u6Kx7oxU4oKsMrV5fMWhFmDMyfAI-9iZDO1XYPW9l0u56/LB_terrainanalysis.png) I have also found a way to project textures onto terrain models.
